## ArrayTypeSchema interface

TypeScript `Array` type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ArrayTypeSchema 
```

## Remarks

See: [https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/everyday-types.html\#arrays](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/everyday-types.html#arrays)

## Example


```ts
type A = string[];
type B = Array<A>;

```
